core:process.core:name: POS Run Customer Line Display Process

core:endProcessAction.core:name: End Process Success
core:endProcessAction.core:comment: The process ends only when a configuration reload is requested. The caller should relaod data and restart the process when ready.

core:outcomeLink.core:comment: Try to restore the previous display if we are cancelling an item part way through, but try to avoid making the display flicker by doing this when not essential.
Action on ClearDisplayInfo following DCCOffered or Foreign Currency events. Should probably be a separate event.

core:action.core:comment: Create a templated document formatter for items and events

core:endProcessAction.core:name: End Process Fail
core:endProcessAction.core:comment: The process ends only when a configuration reload is requested. The caller should relaod data and restart the process when ready.

core:action.core:comment: Gets the current transaction from view data

core:param.value: Error in customer line display process
core:param.name: enactor.coreUI.LogMessage

core:action.core:comment: Format an info event - the document template requires 'basket' as a data item

core:assignAction.core:comment: Need to make sure customer message is defined to avaoid warnings from the document parser.
